about_the_game:
Saint Warner's Angels: Chapter 1 is a free game demo that will feature about 20-30 minutes of gameplay and get the player hooked on the story before the release of the full game. Here's what's to be expected within Chapter 1:

  • A fully illustrated battle with Special Attacks implemented and a condition.

  • Intractable objects and environments.

  • Electric characters that make the small town life more vibrant.

  • Illustrated cutscenes and animated transitions.

  • Small amount of world exploration.

  • A cliffhanger that will keep you hungry for more.

content_descriptors.notes: There are scenes of body horror and mutilation, violence and fighting, and tons of blood. These are all hand drawn scenes, but audiences still may find it disturbing.
